Rattrap:






Rattrap gave up trying to chase down Sage Firestorm and Changeling. It was 
just waste of his time. He didn't know how that mouse was and he didn't know 
if she could help him or not.

He made his way to a lake where he transformed to beast mode and drank from 
it. He wasn't sure where he was going or what he should do. He laid down by 
the shore and napped there for a short while. But he didn't sleep long. He 
was too edgy and hungry. There were to many things that went roaming around 
in the night. He got up and walked to the edge of the forest in the distance 
where in found a gather of berries. His ears went up and the corners of his 
mouth turned into a smile. He remembered this species where edible. Optimus 
had them as specimens. He stood on his hind legs and bit off the berries 
that were ripe enough to eat.
